alert.note: Alert for Northern Elko County; Northern Lander County and Northern Eureka County (Nevada) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 01 at 8:15PM PDT by NWS Elko
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northern Lander and west central Elko Counties through 845 PM PDT... At 814 PM PDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 12 miles southeast of Midas, moving northeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Heavy rainfall along with gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of northern Lander and west central Elko Counties. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Northern Elko County; Northern Lander County and Northern Eureka County
